E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Johnny, man, they're right on top of us.
~z~More of Liberty's least fine. Just what we need.
~z~Yeah? Can't think of what I'd prefer, time in the joint or hanging with some sleazeball lawyer.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~是吗？我都不知道哪个更好，是去蹲号子，还是跟混球律师厮混。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Maybe you should have stolen his lunch money.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~我看你应该把他的午饭钱也抢来。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Always plant a gun, always. What did I tell you?
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~给他塞把枪，懂吧。我教过你吧？

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~I guess it's that lawyer he knows - Grossman.
~z~You know what, I can't wait to get them down the precinct so we can really stomp on those fuckers.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~你知道吗，我等不及想把他们抓进局子，好爆踹他们一顿。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~so I said, "But racial profiling works, motherfucker. Now give up the product."
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~于是我说：「依肤色断案就是管用，傻逼玩意。把货交出来。」
~z~看来你们寡不敌众了，朋友们！

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~You're getting too old for this, Johnny.
~z~McCornish - dammit. Bastard nearly had his twenty.
~z~The second I start thinking maybe the law is okay.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~我刚开始觉得法律没有问题。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Here's as good a place as any.
~z~You know, I forgot how stupid lookin' this guy was, Matthews.
~z~Yeah, they spend the kickbacks on getting high and getting hole - just like the rest of us.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~是啊，他们把回扣花在吸毒和嫖娼上，就像我们帮的那些人。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~How do I look from behind, man? You like looking at my patch?
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~我的背影怎样？我后背的布章好看吗？

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~We run this city, mopes. We are your Gods and we will crush you.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~我们管理这座城市，二逼。我们是你们的神，我们会毁灭你们。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Maybe you should be on the fucking stage with jokes like that.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~真会开玩笑，我看你应该改行说相声。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Man that shit was heavy. I feel bad for them bastards. Once upon a time, they must have wanted to do good.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~天哪，真是难受。我替这些混蛋感到难过。从前，他们一定也想做个好人。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Shit, Johnny. We're about to get fucked by those pigs.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~操，Johnny。我们要被那俩条子逮住了。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Gave him the wrong badge number, thank God. Fucking dickhead!
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~随口编了个警号给他，谢天谢地。傻逼东西！

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Didn't even save me any, you fat fuck. Thanks a lot.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~是没什么好处，你这肥猪。多谢了。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Great, here come the rest of them.
~z~I'm gonna go undercover in your asses, dickheads.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~老子冲进你菊花当卧底，傻逼。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~You think he's smart enough to realise that we got expensive tastes?
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~你说他知不知道我们不是好伺候的主啊？

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~I always thought you biker losers were moronic.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~我就知道你们这些摩托屌丝都是白痴。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Hey, brother, this is about to get real unpleasant.
~z~Couple of therapy sessions and he's free as a bird?
~z~Send in the wrecking crew, Sarge. We got a couple of bikers need to be taught a fucking lesson.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~请求紧急支援，警长。我们要好好教训下这帮飞车党。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~You're going to hell for that, shit head.
~z~There'll be another chance to deal with them. Don't you worry about that.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~总有机会对付他们的。别担心。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~We're looking forward to kicking the shit out of you, mopes.
~z~Fuck me man, the whole LCPD are gonna be after us now. You can't just do that to a cop.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~他奶奶的，现在整个LCPD都要盯上我们了。条子不是随便就能杀的。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~You chose the wrong boys to put the squeeze on.
~z~And here are their buddies. Just great.
~z~You know, cheap sarcasm should be beneath you, Johnny.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~你知道吗，阴阳怪气没好处的，Johnny。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Hey McCornish, this fat perp's brought us a present.
~z~I know, but they can't all be all bad.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~我知道，但他们不可能都是坏人。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Don't this badge mean nothing to you, fuck ups?
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~你们是不把我的警徽放在眼里吗，傻逼？

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~You still know a few tricks, old man. I'll give you that.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~不得不说，你这老家伙还真有两下子。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~The second they shook us down for money, man, they came down to our level.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~在他们向我们索取贿赂的那一刻，他们就和我们没有差别了。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Hey Jim, good to see ya man.
~z~Hey Sarge, me and Matthews need a hand. Send out some boys who ain't afraid to break some fucking heads.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~喂，警长，我和Matthews需要支援。派一些不怕死的弟兄们过来。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Hey fatty, you can't fit on that bike. Why don't you pull over?
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，肥仔，你那摩托要散架了，早点停车吧？

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Throw him in holding and let a pack of meatheads break them fucking potatoes for us.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~关进大牢，让那些瘾君子收拾他们。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Make tracks to Trinity Road, John. Come on. I got some brothers coming to meet us.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~赶紧去Trinity路，John。快点。我在那里安排了弟兄。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Those cops are angry, man. Get back on the bike.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~那俩条子很生气，兄弟。快上摩托车。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Well, tempted as I am by your first option, I'm gonna have to go with the second.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，虽然我更喜欢前者，但我还是得选后者。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Poor assholes don't know what they're in for.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~俩傻逼还不知道自己在往哪走。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~... three heads in the West River and not a body in sight.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~...三颗人头漂在西河上，却没有身体。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Now you owe us the cash and your necks, biker boys.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~现在你们既欠钱又欠命了，摩托仔。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~We ain't the pussies you thought we were.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~我们没有你们想的那么懦弱。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Learn to tune your bike, man. Those cops are gonna be on us for good now.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~把车调整好吧，这下条子要通缉我们一辈子了。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~You know, there's some people on the LCPD who'd thank us for what we're about to do.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~你知道吗，LCPD里会有人感谢我们接下来要做的事的。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Yeah, just the ones in Liberty City.
~z~We got lucky there, Johnny boy. I thought we'd be shovelling shit for those dudes 'til God knows when.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~我们很走运，Johnny仔。我还以为要给他们当一辈子孙子。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~close to where I happen to know they got themselves set up,
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~那两个混蛋正好在会所附近蹲点。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~You fucking mopes. McCornish was the best bad cop I knew.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~你们这群混蛋。McCornish是我认识的最牛逼的坏警察。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Pull over so we can beat the shit out of you.
~z~No commemorative gold watch and nice little bribe for you, man.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~没给二位准备大金链子小金表。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Ha, ha! Bet that shut him up.
~z~We gotta finish this bullshit off, get us to Trinity in Acter Industrial.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~我们要一劳永逸，去Acter工业区的Trinity路。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~You guys are the dumbest fucking mopes I've ever seen in all of my years of service.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~当警察这么多年，你们是我见过最蠢的二逼。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Back up! Back up! Some perps have just got a hard on for killing cops. We got a man down!
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~呼叫支援！呼叫支援！有罪犯在屠杀警察。我们有人倒下了！

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~and we show them that we're not quite the bitches they think we are.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~让他们知道我们不是那么好欺负的。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Round up the boys. We got a cop killer on our hands! Man down!
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~集合人员。杀害警员的凶手就在眼前！友军伤亡！

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Head to Trinity in Acter Industrial, alright? The boys are gonna meet us there.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~去Acter工业区的Trinity路，好吧？弟兄们埋伏在那里。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~You got no idea the shit storm that's going to come down on you, you fucking pricks.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~马上你们就要面临血雨腥风了，一群猪头。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~I don't like people having a hold on me like this. People ask me why I dislike cops...
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~我不喜欢被别人这样束缚。有人问我为什么讨厌警察...

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~They should get treated like the rest of us as well. Law of the streets.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~他们也该像我们帮的其他人一样，用街头的规矩对待。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~This is where we deal with this bullshit.
~z~A dirty cop's just like a Deadbeat or a Triad or any other crook in this town.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~腐败警察跟死妈天使、三合会这样的坏人之流没有区别。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~This is the fucking end for all you Lost bikers.
~z~Johnny, they're calling in for reinforcements. Shut 'em up.
~z~There'll be another chance to deal with them. Don't you worry about that.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~总有机会对付他们的。别担心。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Come on. I give up, alright, I give up. Come on, tell me.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~好啦。我投降，好吧，我投降。好了，告诉我吧。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~How bout we race over to those fucking dirty cops, old man? Think you can handle it?
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~我们比比谁先骑到臭条子那里吧，老家伙？你有信心赢吗？

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~You pigs chose to play dirty, didn't you?
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~你们这些条子选择了耍手段，不是吗？

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~ It's about time someone beat back on the LCPD.
~z~Yeah, I know man, I know. Look after yourself.
~z~Jim, Johnny, we're here for you brothers.
~z~The rest of your fucking biker buddies are gonna pay for this, too. You fucking hump.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~你们整个摩托帮都会为此付出代价，两个傻逼。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Where the hell are you going, man?
~z~This is just like the old days.
~z~You're going to pay for that coffee and donut fat man.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~毁了我的咖啡跟甜甜圈就别想跑了，肥猪。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Let's see if you still got it, old man. Let's drop the fuckin' hammer on this run to those assholes.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~看看你的车技有没有退步吧，老家伙。比比谁先开到那俩混蛋那儿。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~and prepare to take it from these fat pigs for the rest of our lives.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~然后被这两个条子压榨一辈子。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~They're calling for backup, Johnny. Cut 'em off.
~z~Mommy. He's crying like a little fucking bitch. Matthews you kill me you prick.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~妈咪。他像婆娘一样哭个不停。Matthews，我快笑死了。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Yeah, paying taxes and declaring incomes. And all the while taking the kickbacks.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~是啊，老老实实纳税、申报收入。然后私下拿着回扣。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~We can't let 'em call for backup, Johnny boy. Close 'em down.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~不能让他们呼叫支援，Johnny。干掉他们。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~A hooker being picked up by the chief on a Saturday night and let off with a special caution.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~周六晚上，局长带走了一个妓女，口头警告一下就放人了。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Brother, those cops have almost got us.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~兄弟，那俩条子快追上咱们了。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~You stole his donut and spilled his coffee. Real mature, man.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~你抢了他的甜甜圈，泼了他的咖啡。够爷们儿，兄弟。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Hey man, can you shake this bacon?
~z~Officer down. Officer down. We need fucking back up ten minutes ago!
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~有警察倒下了。有警察倒下了。早十分钟就该派支援了！

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Ha ha ha! Turned out to be a sociology professor at Vespucci University.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~哈哈哈！结果他是Vespucci大学的社会学教授。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~We got the whole LCPD behind us, you fucking shit birds.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~我们有整个LCPD当靠山，傻逼鸟人。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Now you know we ain't going out like that, Jim. I'll see you soon.
~z~Hey, Billy's Billy. They had him cooped up in that place for a while. He's just blowin' off some steam.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，Billy就是Billy。他被关了一段时间，现在只是要发泄一下。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Tell some of the boys to get their nightsticks out, Sarge. We got a couple of bikers need to be broken.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~长官，告诉兄弟们拿好装备。我们得对付一帮飞车党。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Either, we buy a big tub of grease
~z~Maybe I should do the driving, man.
~z~The way I see it we got two choices.
~z~Oh yeah. You messed with a dirty cop's donut. You're one badass biker.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~哦，没错。你抢了臭条子的甜甜圈，真是一个大坏蛋。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Age before beauty, my man. Age before beauty.
~z~We don't have time for this, man.
~z~Or, we head over to the clubhouse,
~z~We just couldn't take 'em out in the open like that. They're still cops. See you soon, man.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~我们不能大摇大摆地干掉他们。他们可是警察。之后见，兄弟。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Worse; at least we ain't pretending to respect the law.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~他们更糟，我们至少不用装作守法。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Oh, Man. I'm getting to old for this shit.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~噢，兄弟。我这年纪快干不动了。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~We don't want to piss 'em off too much. Not yet, at least.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~我们不能做得太过。至少现在不行。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~... I.A.D. and the Sarge taking turns to screw me like it's my fucking quinceañera.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~...内务部和警长轮番折磨我，搞得跟给我办成人礼一样。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Alright then James, that's a few less dirty cops polluting this fine city.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，James，这座城市又少了几匹害群之马。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Shit, Jim, you should think about retiring with moves like that.
~z~Johnny man, we can't have the cops catching us now. Lose this heat.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~Johnny兄弟，现在还不能让条子抓到我们。甩掉他们。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~That was easier than paying a bribe.
~z~I know, I know, it's just there's only so many you can carry. Who'd think there'd be five of them.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~我懂，我懂。可是我没这么多枪啊，谁知道他们有五个人。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~How you feeling, Jim? Billy, man. I hope he handles his shit.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~感觉如何，Jim？Billy，天，我希望他能处理好他的事。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Ha! You are fucking killing me man. What'd you eat funny pills today or what?
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~哈！你是想笑死我啊。你今天吃错药了吧？

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~No, no, no. It was the Humboldt. They found those left feet in the West River.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~不不不，你那是Humboldt河。在西河发现的是几只左脚。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~We're gonna break your necks, you scum.
~z~Is someone screwing with our brothers? Fuck you.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~有人找我兄弟们的麻烦吗？操你妈。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Nothing like the feel of a fully automatic pistol in your hand, you son of a bitch.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~再爽也爽不过手握全自动手枪了，妈了个逼的。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Man, I want the old Billy back, the one before the heroin.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~老兄，我更想要以前的Billy，没沾上海洛因的Billy。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Sure. How the hell did Billy managed to get off with rehab, anyway?
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~确实。对了，Billy到底是怎么被放出来了？

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~Something tells me they weren't the only ones in the LCPD, Johnny. Back to the house, my man.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~我觉得LCPD里不会只有他们两个坏警察，Johnny。回会所吧，好兄弟。

E1J2AUD.original: ~z~We got to lose this heat, man.
~z~It might have something to do with those cops that pulled one over on us.
E1J2AUD.translated: ~z~可能跟上次拦下我们的那对条子有关。
